name: Twaliens
description:
TWALIENS is a 3D shoot ´em up with retro-lo fi aesthetic set in chaotic planets, where two aliens must cooperate strategically in order to defeat enemy hordes and planetary bosses Cooperate with a friend fighting enemies and conquering worlds for order of a God

KEY FEATURES:

  • Frenetic combat against guardian hordes and planetary bosses
  • Capturing zones through altar completion
  • Exchange weapons with cooldown and separate functions
  • Two players oriented gameplay, local multiplayer
  • Remarkable camera transition and gameplay

Minimum system requirements:
OS: Win7/Win8/Win10 (64 bits)
CPU: Intel Core i3, 3 GHz/AMD Phenom X6, 3 GHz
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX 1GB
Memory: 6 GB RAM

 IMPORTANT!

  • You must be 2 players for playing
  • You must need 2 gamepads for playing
  • A level with a planetary boss will be include next month 
  • We warn that this level will be crazy and really hard to finish!
  • We are currently working for expand the Twaliens world!
FOLLOW US  @TWALIENSGAME
